H0.text: In Greek mythology, what was the name of the beautiful shepherd boy of Asia Minor, beloved of the goddess Seelene, who put him in a deep sleep so that she might embrace him. Adonis

H1.text: In Greek mythology, what was the name of the beautiful shepherd boy of Asia Minor, beloved of the goddess Seelene, who put him in a deep sleep so that she might embrace him. Attis

H2.text: In Greek mythology, what was the name of the beautiful shepherd boy of Asia Minor, beloved of the goddess Seelene, who put him in a deep sleep so that she might embrace him. Hyacinth

H3.text: In Greek mythology, what was the name of the beautiful shepherd boy of Asia Minor, beloved of the goddess Seelene, who put him in a deep sleep so that she might embrace him. ENDYMION

A4.text: Apollonius of Rhodes (3rd century BC) is one of the many poets who tell how Selene, the Titan goddess of the Moon, loved the mortal Endymion.

A5.text: The role of lover of Selene, the Moon goddess, is attributed primarily to the Endymion who was either a shepherd or an astronomer.
